channel.title: San Francisco-Oakland Bay Bridge on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in San Francisco-Oakland Bay Bridge on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 4
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 4 - Treasure Island/Yerba Buena Island. This is on Yerba Buena Island in the San Francsico Bay - halfway across the San Francisco-Oakland Bay Bridge.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 8A
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 8A - West Grand Ave./Maritime St. This is the last exit before the San Francisco-Oakland Bay Bridge

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 8B
item.description: I-80 east at the I-580/I-80 split (Exit 8B). Use I-580 for Download Oakland/Hayward-Stockton. Use I-880 for Alameda/San Jose. I-80 traffic turns towards the Bay Bridge.
